name: El sueno de la razon
description:
Short story introduction
This is story about little girl Ann, who locked herself in her room. The reason? She is obsessed by inner demons, named "Grey people", which slowly corrupt her mind. The only way to defeat these creatures - meet them face to face in the world of Ann dreams and touch them. If not - Ann would be mentally ill.

Gameplay
This demo was inspered by Yume Nikki. But there are no "effects", large labyrintрs and things like that.
